Avondale.ISM Raceway: ISM Raceway is a 1-mile, low-banked tri-oval race track located in Avondale, Arizona, near Phoenix. The motorsport track opened in 1964 and currently hosts two NASCAR race weekends and 1 IndyCar Series race weekend annually. ISM Raceway has also hosted the CART, USAC and the WeatherTech SportsCar Championship.
